product.longDescription: Men's BROOKS® GHOST 13 :: Transition from landing to toe-off even smoother in the updated Men's Brooks Ghost 13 running shoes. You now get the just-right softness of DNA Loft cushioning extending from beyond the heel all the way to the forefoot for your smoothest ride yet. The 3D Fit Print upper applies strategic stretch and structure for a super comfortable fit while this new Air Mesh hugs your foot with supernatural breathability in your runner favorite Ghost 13.
product.featuresBenefits1: <ul><li><b>Running Shoe Support</b>: Your Ghost 13 is a neutral running shoe that's light, flexible and perfect for medium to high arches that don't need a lot of support.</li><li><b>Cushion Level</b>: Level 4 Cushion gives you lots of cushion to soften landings for long or short runs.</li><li><b>Midsole Drop</b>: Your Men's Brooks Ghost 13 has a heel to toe drop of 12 mm.</li><li><b>Shoe Weight</b>: 10.1 ounces</li><li><b>Perfect For</b>: Everyday running on roads and paved paths.</li><li><b>VIP 90-Day Perfect Fit Promise</b>: VIP Family members can test run the Brooks Ghost 13 totally risk-free. If this running shoe isn't your perfect fit, exchange 'em within 90 days. Easy!</li></ul><b>RUNNING SHOE TECHNOLGY</b><ul><br><li><b>Super Breathable Upper</b>: This long-distance running shoe features a new, Engineered Mesh upper that hugs your foot for a secure and breathable fit.</li><li><b>Snug, Stretch Fit</b>: 3D Fit Print applies strategic stretch and structure to the upper for a plush shoe fit that gently holds your foot in place.</li><li><b>Now More Cushion</b>: Soften every step and stride with even more DNA LOFT cushioning that extends throughout the midsole. You get super soft cushioning underfoot and a smoother transition from heel to toe no matter how your foot lands.</li><li><b>Item Number for Web-Only Shoe Colors</b>: 1000038328</li></ul>

Men's BROOKS® GHOST 13 :: Transition from landing to toe-off even smoother in the updated Men's Brooks Ghost 13 running shoes. You now get the just-right softness of DNA Loft cushioning extending from beyond the heel all the way to the forefoot for your smoothest ride yet. The 3D Fit Print upper applies strategic stretch and structure for a super comfortable fit while this new Air Mesh hugs your foot with supernatural breathability in your runner favorite Ghost 13.

Running Shoe Technology
  • Running Shoe Support: Your Ghost 13 is a neutral running shoe that's light, flexible and perfect for medium to high arches that dont need a lot of support
  • Super Breathable Upper: This long-distance running shoe features a new, Engineering Mesh upper that hugs your foot for a secure and breathable fit
  • Snug, Stretch Fit: Your Ghost 13 is a neutral running shoe that's light, flexible and perfect for medium to high arches that dont need a lot of support
  • Now more Cushion: Soften every step and stride with even more DNA LOFT cushioning that extends throughout the midsole. You get super soft cushioning underfoot and a smoother transition from heel to toe no matter how your foot lands
